naslov: Prodaja - Kuća s tri stambene jedinice 217 m2 u mirnoj ulici - Sv. Duh (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Kuća s tri stambene jedinicee 217 m2 - Sv. Duh Prošećite nekretninom na sljedećim linkovima: https://my.matterport.com/models/Zr5WF3SPLoJ https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=9C3BsuxzMDj Prodajemo dvojnu kuću koja se sastoji od suterena, prizemlja, prvog i drugog kata te ima 3 odvojene stambene jedinice. Kuća je kvalitetne gradnje, građena 1970-ih . Suterenski stan  od 46 m2 se sastoji od: ulazne prostorije, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, spavaće sobe i kupaonice. Stan u prizemlju površine 49 m2 ima: prostrani hodnik, dnevni boravak, kuhinju, spavaću sobu i balkon s prekrasnim i otvorenim pogledom na šumu i Medvednicu. Pripada mu i prostrana terasa do koje se dolazi vanjskim stubištem. Na prvom i drugom katu nalazi se dvoetažni stan površine 110 m2. Na prvoj etaži su: hodnik, dnevni boravak, kuhinja, spavaća soba te kupaonica i balkon koji se proteže uz dvije strane kuće. Na drugoj etaži su: hodnik, balkon, dvije spavaće sobe od kojih jedna ima vlastitu kupaonicu i garderobu. Grijanje je centralno etažno plinsko, a stolarija je PVC. Kuća gleda na tri strane, istok, sjever i jug. Ima uređen vrt ispred kuće te garažu površine 19 m2, a ispred garaže postoji mogućnost parkiranja za 2 vozila.  Ispod garaže se nalaze dva uredna spremišta od 25 m2. Kuća se nalazi u mirnoj ulici te je okružena zelenilom. Terase i balkoni imaju prekrasan pogled na Sljeme te je kuća udaljena od gradske vreve. Idealno za investiciju ili veću obitelj. Odlična lokacija, blizina trgovine, autobusne stanice, bolnice, škole, dječjeg vrtića. For Sale – House with Three Residential Units, 217 m² – Sv. Duh Take a virtual tour of the property at the following links: Tour 1 Tour 2 We are selling a semi-detached house consisting of a basement, ground floor, first and second floors, with three separate residential units. The house is solidly built, constructed in the 1970s. Basement apartment (46 m²) includes: an entrance area, living room, kitchen, bedroom, and bathroom. Ground floor apartment (49 m²) features: a spacious hallway, living room, kitchen, bedroom, and a balcony with a beautiful open view of the forest and Medvednica mountain. It also has a spacious terrace accessible via an external staircase. Duplex apartment (110 m²), located on the first and second floors: First level: hallway, living room, kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, and a wrap-around balcony on two sides of the house. Second level: hallway, balcony, two bedrooms (one with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet). The house has central gas heating and PVC windows. It faces three directions: east, north, and south. The property includes a well-maintained garden, a garage (19 m²), and parking for two additional vehicles in front of the garage. Below the garage, there are two tidy storage rooms (25 m²). Located in a quiet street surrounded by greenery, the terraces and balconies offer stunning views of Sljeme, making it a peaceful retreat from city noise. Perfect for investment or a large family. Excellent location, close to shops, a bus stop, hospital, school, and kindergarten. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb
